text:
I would like to recommend HII WOMEN'S CLINIC @ Yishun.  ‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre looking for a caring and knowledgeable Dr. Hii Hoi chin very professional and attentive. From Day 1 until I'm giving birth soon.
he took the time to explain every test and treatment clearly. He‚Äôs very patient and made me feel at ease throughout the process.

The two nurses was friendly, and accomodating  the clinic
cleanliness. Highly recommend!‚Äù
THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR TAKING CARE OF ME ALL OUTüíï

had been under care of Dr Hii since 2008. he had always been very caution, patient and caring. Always very patient to explain situation with us and analysis the problem with us.

And his pricing is also very reasonable and most importantly, he operate on night clinic twice weekly so make it very convenient for working woman.

Nurses are also very friendly, nice and helpful.

I was recommended by a relative who engaged Dr. Hii for her 3 pregnancies. Dr. Hii has deep understanding and experience in his field, throughout my pregnancy I was very well taken care of and the delivery of my first child was quicker than I expected. I had a vacuum birth and during the delivery I was glad to witness Dr. Hii's professionalism and assertiveness in making sure the delivery went well. I did not experience too much postpartum discomfort aside the usual post delivery pains.

My husband and I enjoy going for our appointments, the clinic staff are friendly and pro-active. Dr. Hii is a man of few words (imagine a quiet father), but he is very reassuring and concise in delivering only essential and important information, which is exactly what we appreciate as oftentimes overly chatty doctors put us off.

I was previously informed by others that the fees would be higher than other private practices, but for the level of expertise and care I received, and convenience of accessibility I felt what I paid for was well justified. I deeply recommend Dr. Hii to all expecting mums or ladies who need help.

Dr Hii was my gynae and delivered my baby in May 2024. I am grateful for him and his nurses. Will definitely still go back to him if I'm expecting my no.2. He may look cold at first. However, he's very calm during the big day. sometimes when im too ganjiong, he will still joke and gives me assurance. To him, nothing is a big problem to him. Thank you, Dr. Hii. Also, a big shout out to nurse Ann & Esther, thank you for being a part of my pregnancy journey.

Dr Hii is very experienced and assuring. He pays close attention to your condition and prescribes timely treatment. I‚Äôm glad to have engaged Dr Hii for my two pregnancies! A shout out to the nurses, Esther and Ann, for their professionalism too.
